Posts.Content: I had a Limpectomy I now wear a pull over strecthy bra so that each breast will fit since I am different sizes now. I can no longer wear a bra that has to be fasten from the back anymore and it doesn't fit like it use too either. I found a bra at walmart a strechty one love it. $5.00
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy
